nodes.text: Padawan Training was the name of a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It depicted a Human male Jedi Padawan named Asotost Lemme wielding a purple lightsaber against a dangerous beast resembling the Sher Kar on the planet Mustafar. The story behind the painting suggested that Lemme, in search of his lost friend, stumbled upon the lair, forcing him to put his Padawan training to use, lest he suffer the same fate as those who failed before him.
Padawan Training was a painting in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
This was one of three paintings offered to players during the launch of Game Update 16. The painting was created from art created by an actual player named Asotost Lemme of Shadowfire.
